Class StatisticalGridLayer

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.render.grid.DefaultGridLayer
com.arbergashi.charts.render.grid.StatisticalGridLayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
GridLayer
public final class StatisticalGridLayer extends DefaultGridLayer
Statistical grid layer.

Part of the Zero-Allocation Render Path. High-frequency execution safe.

1.7.0
